mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE_NUMBER, WISH_LIST, COUPON_LIST, PAYMENT_CARD) VALUES (#{email},#{password},#{nickname},#{phone_number},#{wish_list},#{coupon_list},#{payment_card})
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET (EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE_NUMBER, WISH_LIST, COUPON_LIST, PAYMENT_CARD) =(#{email},#{password},#{nickname},#{phone_number},#{wish_list},#{coupon_list},#{payment_card}) WHERE id=#{id}
